sections.PURPOSE: Increase the lethality and cohesion of the Troop and prepare for PLT LFX
sections.KEY TASKS: include mvmt to TRP, day 0 weapons mx, SI inventory, day 0 recovery
sections.EXECUTION: Begins with conclusion of TEWT, ends with final live iteration.
sections.COMMAND AND SIGNAL:
OIC: LT Shepler
RSO: SFC Padilla
Primary: TSM
Alternate: FM
Contingency: Signal/AWS WIKR
Emergency: Runner
C TRP SQD LFX – Range 307
sections.MISSION:
XXX SQD conducts an attack to destroy enemy forces IVO 32U QA 0079 1217 NLT DD TTTT OCT 24, IOT allow freedom of maneuver for USF
Squad will take contact before reaching the OBJ
Scheme of Maneuver:
SP on RTE Wizard
SQD receives chance contact from a BMP and dismounts o/o PL Red
SQD conducts a mounted react to far ambush/react to contact and VDOs prior to PL White
Vehicles occupy hasty defensive positions at PL White
SQD conducts a hasty attack on the BLDG at PL Blue
SQD consolidates at BLDG

SL will decide where to VDO
